title: Number of people freelancing in U.S. 2014 to 2019
yAxis: Number of people doing freelance work in million
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of people doing freelance work in million, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2019 to 2018.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
gold: This statistic shows the number of freelance workers in the United States from 2014 to 2019 . In 2019 , there were 57 million people doing freelance work in the U.S .
